stepTitle: An electronics retailer used regression to find a simple model to predict sales growth in the first quarter of the new year (January through March). The model is good for $$90$$ days, where $$x$$ is the day. The model can be written as follows: ŷ $$=$$ $$101.32$$ + $$2.48x$$ where ŷ is in thousands of dollars. What would you predict the sales to be on day 60?
